description: This database contains the embedded vectors and some other related attributes for the `biology_paper` database.

collection.description: This table stores the embedded vector of the `text_content` column for each row in the `biology_paper.chunks` table.

fields.description: A unique identifier for each vector.
The embedded vector of the `biology_paper.chunks.text_content` column.
The row ID in the original `biology_paper.chunks` table.
